content: the learn-to-knit scarf is a great first project i designed in for a workshop i am teaching at southern maine community college it starts out with garter stitch first with knitting and then with purling afterwards there are 6 simple patterns combining only knit and purl stitches this is ideal both for a workshop or class setting but also for self-teaching **note this pattern is free of charge organizations may use it to offer free classes businesses may not charge for its use
